message: The Sussmans will both be in attendance of course
Looks like we'll have a copy of SICP signed by Abelson, Sussman, and Sussman to give away at the trivia contest at Strange Loop
I am excited about the upcoming conference!

Really excited!  Looking forward to all the brain candy, but also hoping I'll be able to bring back some things to introduce in my day job too. I've been super-excited about Clojure for over 2 years, but haven't so far had the JVM-fu to introduce it into the OSGi container where our main application lives.
@warren Rolled a Klein Bottle die. A result didn't turn up.
I've heard Clojure with OSGi is tricky due to the classloader issues. Haven't done it myself.
so, we ready to do this thing?
Yep.  Can't wait to fill the brain with new stuff!!
this plane cant take off soon enough! excited for my first strangeloop!
Registration is only needed if you have not paid yet or is it to check in too?
